name: CHAOS (itch) (Leon Stansfield)
description:
FULLSCREEN  IS RECOMMENDED FOR UI SCALING REASONS.

This game was made in one week for the brackeys game jam and challenges the player to survive as long as they can in a room full of bad guys trying to kill them. Shoot, throw grenades and bash to survive. 

This game was a bit more experimental to try and make some relatively simple gameplay feel satisfying with sound design and visual effects like screen shake and particle effects.

All feedback is appreciated!

Thanks for playing!

CONTROLS:

wasd, mouse: movement

left click: shoot, right-click: grenade

Left Shift: Bash, when near to a projectile, bash will pause time and let you dash away, throwing the projectile in the opposite direction.

KNOWN BUGS AND ISSUES:

  • Sometimes when bashing the aim gets missaligned. I am looking into a fix for this but it seems to be fixed by bashing again.
